Posted By: DaaNz (3/14/2009 8:33:40 AM)

posts.post_content:
poor Mercadian Masques- such a great art, and decent flavor text, utterly and completely Sizzled by the awesome hotness that is Jaya Ballard, Best Red Planeswalker Ever (yes, I AM counting Koth!)
  
   
This is one of those pre-Xth Core Set cards that you just HAVE to track down a foil playset of.
  
   
a) blackborder cards are better
  
b) foil cards are better, and do in fact win more games.
  
c) its a RED DAMAGE SPELL!
  
MUST HAVE FOIL!!!!!!!!!!
  
   
I have posted about a hundred comments on Red Cards today. YES, I UNDERSTAND THE FR\*KING TERMS AND CONDITIONING OF POSTING!
posts.html:

a) blackborder cards are better
b) foil cards are better, and do in fact win more games.
c) its a RED DAMAGE SPELL!

posts.post_content:
I want to like this, but I don't really think burn decks tend to do well in the kinds of multiplayer games that can make use of this.  
  
[Slagstorm](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Slagstorm) and [Volcanic Fallout](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Volcanic Fallout) are probably the better cards more often than not.
posts.html:
I want to like this, but I don't really think burn decks tend to do well in the kinds of multiplayer games that can make use of this.

Slagstorm and Volcanic Fallout are probably the better cards more often than not.
